The Experience

You remember the party. Sort of. Now you're in a room with other guests, all trying to recall what happened. But as memories surface, you realize they might earn you more than just answers.

About Last Night is a 90-120 minute immersive crime thriller combining escape room puzzles, role-play, social deduction, and strategic trading mechanics. Memory makes rivals in this game of mystery, manipulation and unexpected alliances.

The playtest will begin with a quick expectation-setting conversation once you're checked in. This is a work in progress and will be incomplete and broken at times. THANK YOU for helping make our game better with your time and feedback!

Note: This playtest session will run 2.5-3 hours including a feedback discussion.
